summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Galer Street and West Galer Street as extended, from 30th Avenue West to 32nd Avenue West; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8757 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
